sections.heading: to 53-237. - Offenses against chastity, generally
sections.text: Section 53-237a. - Concealment of delivery: Class A misdemeanor.Section 53-238 to 53-241. - Rape. Assault with intent to commit rape; with intent to carnally know female child. Examination for venereal disease of persons accused of violations of chap

sections.heading: Concealment of delivery: Class A misdemeanor.
sections.text:
(a) A person is guilty of concealment of delivery who intentionally conceals the delivery of any child, whether such child was delivered alive or dead.

(b) Concealment of delivery is a class A misdemeanor.

(1971, P.A. 871, S. 56.)

sections.heading: to 53-241. - Rape. Assault with intent to commit rape; with intent to carnally know female child
sections.text:
Sections 53-238 to 53-241, inclusive, are repealed.

(1949 Rev., S. 8562â€“8565; 1969, P.A. 828, S. 214.)
